projectOverview.name: Political Sphere
projectOverview.description: A democratically-governed multiplayer political simulation game with strict constitutional governance
projectOverview.architecture: Monorepo with Nx workspace, modular structure

importBoundaries.symptom: CI fails with import boundary violations
importBoundaries.solution: Check scripts/ci/check-import-boundaries.js, ensure imports follow module boundaries
importBoundaries.prevention: Use Nx generators for new modules

accessibility.solution: Run scripts/ci/a11y-check.sh, add ARIA labels, semantic HTML

security.solution: Review ai-controls.json quality gates, avoid hardcoded secrets
security.prevention: Use secure coding practices from day one

codeStyle.naming: kebab-case for files, PascalCase for components, camelCase for functions
codeStyle.errorHandling: Always include try/catch, meaningful error messages

developmentWorkflow.branching: feature branches from main, PR reviews required
developmentWorkflow.ci: Lint, test, security scan, accessibility check on every PR
developmentWorkflow.deployment: Canary deployments, blue-green for critical services

performancePatterns.lazyLoading: Components and routes loaded on demand
